alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 07 at 6:58PM EDT until April 07 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 104 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BERTIE CAMDEN CHOWAN CURRITUCK PASQUOTANK PERQUIMANS IN VIRGINIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN EASTERN VIRGINIA NORTHAMPTON IN SOUTHEAST VIRGINIA ACCOMACK CITY OF CHESAPEAKE CITY OF NORFOLK CITY OF POQUOSON CITY OF PORTSMOUTH CITY OF VIRGINIA BEACH THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF BOWERS HILL, CAPE CHARLES, CAPE COLONY, CHESAPEAKE AIRPORT, CHINCOTEAGUE, CURRITUCK, DEEP CREEK, EDENHOUSE, EDENTON, ELIZABETH CITY, EXMORE, FENTRESS, GREAT BRIDGE, GREENBACKVILLE, GREENBRIER, HANCOCK, HERTFORD, HORNTOWN, HORSESHOE, LILLY, MACEDONIA, MAVATON, MERRY HILL, MIDWAY, MOUNT PLEASANT, NEW CHURCH, NORFOLK, ONANCOCK, POQUOSON, PORTSMOUTH, QUITSNA, SAINT JOHNS, SHARON, VALHALLA, VIRGINIA BEACH, AND WINDSOR.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Camden; Chowan; Currituck; Pasquotank; Perquimans
